hints.content:
We can break apart the number $\maroonD{63}$ by place value.

$\maroonD{63} = \maroonD{60} + \maroonD{3}$

Now, lets rewrite $\maroonD{63} + \blueE{7}$ but replace our $\maroonD{63}$ with our addition sentence.

$\begin{align}
&\maroonD{63}+\blueE{7}\\\\
=&(\maroonD{60} + \maroonD{3})+\blueE{7}
\end{align}$

Next, we can shift the parentheses to be around the $\maroonD3 + \blueE7$.

$\begin{align}
&\maroonD{63}+\blueE{7}\\\\
=&(\maroonD{60} + \maroonD{3})+\blueE{7}\\\\
=&\maroonD{60}+ (\maroonD3+\blueE{7})\\\\
\end{align}$

Here is completed set of equations:

$\begin{align}
&\maroonD{63}+\blueE{7}\\\\
=&(\maroonD{60} + \maroonD{3})+\blueE{7}\\\\
=&\maroonD{60}+ (\maroonD3+\blueE{7})\\\\
=&\maroonD{60}+\purpleD{10}\\\\
=&\goldE{70}
\end{align}$

question.content:
**Complete to solve $63 + 7$.**

$\maroonD{63}+\blueE7$ | 
- | - 
$=(\maroonD{60}+$ [[☃ input-number 5]]$)+ \blueE7$|
$=\maroonD{60} + ($[[☃ input-number 6]] $+ \blueE7)$ | 
$=\maroonD{60} + $ [[☃ input-number 7]] | 
$=$ [[☃ input-number 8]]|
